3.75. 
Proceedings concerning the separation of spouses 
1. Proceedings concerning the legal separation of spouses shall be brought under the right of action. 
2. The court must take measures to reconcile the spouses, taking into account the interests of the minor children of the spouses as well as the interests of one of the spouses (Article 3.54 of this Code). 
3. The court may, if necessary, apply the interim measures referred to in Article 3.65 of this Code.
